1.title: Essa conta eu não pago!
1.description: A report from the Instituto de Pesos e Medidas do Amazonas (Ipem) proved that several of the new “smart” devices installed by the Amazonas Energia concessionaire presented irregularities and charged twice the amount of electricity consumption to the population! Residents who were harmed by this mistake need to be compensated!

2.title: Aposentadoria Para Nossas Mães
2.description: After a lifetime dedicated to caring for their children, many women are unable to retire because they have not completed the necessary contribution time. If approved, Bill 2757/21 will finally recognize these efforts and guarantee the right to retirement for mothers over 60 years of age, in addition to allowing the period of maternity leave to be counted as time of service. It is time to take care of those who always took care of us!

3.title: Trabalho Infantil Não!
3.description: Deputies who support president Bolsonaro want to approve a Proposal for an Amendment to the Constitution (PEC 18/2011) that aims to reduce the age at which teenagers can work - labor would be legalized from the age of 14. This is an attack on the rights of young people!
3.navigate: Pressure now and help us stop this absurd!

4.title: Cada Voto Conta
4.description: Today, only 10% of young Brazilians between the ages of 16 and 18 have a voter registration card. To change this scenario, we invited young people of voting age to participate in a collective effort to register to vote and invite their friends to do the same until May 4th! And, in the end, in addition to contributing to the strengthening of democracy, they can also compete to win awards!
4.navigate: Take part in the campaign! Our future is up to us!

5.title: Honra Não É Desculpa
5.description: For decades, the argument of "legitimate defense of honor" was used in cases of gender based violence, as a way to  hold the victim responsible for the violence suffered, while the agressor remained free. In 2021, the STF declared this thesis as unconstitutional, but there is still no law that guarantees that this argument is not used in court. We need to act NOW to end impunity in cases of gender based violence!

6.title: Supervia, aumento não!
6.description: SuperVia, the company responsible for rail transport in Rio de Janeiro, proposed an increase in the train tickets in the city, which would now cost R$7. We need to mobilize now so that this abusive measure is suspended!

7.title: Geração Que Move
7.description: Geração Que Move is a training program in social mobilization, and is the result of a partnership between NOSSAS and UNICEF, aimed at young people from Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo who want to transform their cities.

8.title: Meu Nome Importa!
8.description: The Bill that will grant transgender people the access to the Social Name Identification Card hasn’t been discussed in months in the Legislative Assembly of Amazonas and is in danger of being rejected. We need to act now to secure the project is approved!

9.title: PETAR sem Concessão
9.description: The Government of São Paulo plans to initiate a 30-year concession project for the Alto do Ribeira State Park (PETAR), allowing the private sector to explore the region, ignoring the environmental damage that this would cause, and the wishes of traditional communities and residents of the area. We need to stop this!

10.title: Lutar Não é Crime
10.description: A proposal known as the “Antiterrorism Bill” can be voted by the Congress at any time. If approved, the project will allow the political persecution of activists and the criminalization of social movements. It's time to act to stop this threat to democracy!

11.title: PL da Boiada Não!
11.description: Bill 2159/2021, known as “PL da Boiada”, is to be voted in the Senate at any time. If approved, it will end environmental licensing and open the “gateway” to practices that cause the destruction of our ecossystem and cause environmental disasters, such as the tragedies of Brumadinho and Mariana. It's time to fight this measure!

12.title: Sem Licença Pra Matar
12.description: A proposal to reform the Military Penal Code makes room for police officers accused in cases of murder or aggression not to be trialed. We need to stop this absurd!

13.title: EmLuta
13.description: Over 5 million brazilians have lost family members and loved ones to Covid-19. It's time to mobilize and demand the public power to ensure that these families are not left without support.

14.title: Praça Pôr do Sol without fences NOW!
14.description: The Praça Pôr do Sol was fenced off by the São Paulo City Hall without any public debate! It's time to ask for the City Hall to change this policy and prevent the definitive fencing of the square!

15.title: Parque Realengo Verde
15.description: Residents of Realengo, a district in the West Zone of Rio de Janeiro, have been fighting over decades to keep one of the last green areas in the region standing.
15.navigate: Pressure for an urban and ecological park

16.title: Livre Para Menstruar
16.description: In several states in Brazil, girls are articulating bills on menstrual poverty.

17.title: Sai da Fossa, Manaus!
17.description: In the city of Manaus, 8 out of 10 inhabitants do not have access to the sewage system. It's time to demand that the mayor guarantee increased coverage of this service to all city's citizens.
